pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, December 21, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, December 21, 2017:

Mississauga, Ontario

11 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a memorial service for Barry and Honey Sherman.

International Centre
6900 Airport Road

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage
  • For more information please contact: Naomi Parness (416-580-0601, nparness@ujafed.org)

Media appearances

  • An interview with the Prime Minister and CÃ©line Galipeau will air at 9:30 p.m. on RDI and at 10:30 p.m. on Radio-Canada.
